mapper.insert: insert into topic(topicid , usersid , goodsid , num , contents , addtime ) values(#{topicid} , #{usersid} , #{goodsid} , #{num} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update topic set usersid=#{usersid} , goodsid=#{goodsid} , num=#{num} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} where topicid=#{topicid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.goodsname from topic a , users b , goods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.goodsid = c.goodsid order by topicid desc
select a.* from topic a where topicid=#{topicid} order by topicid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.goodsname from topic a , users b , goods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.goodsid = c.goodsid
and b.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and c.goodsname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{goodsid}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
